dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: This is where regenerative ampules are made.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: They’re publicly called “HP bullets”… but the underlying principle is a nanobot-based medical treatment.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: There have been struggles here and there, but at the moment, the ampule I sliiightly modified recently is the most commonly used version.
So let me get this straight… You’re the one who supplied that? Dammit, do you have any idea how much that made us suffer—
We barely managed to crawl over that adversary…

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I’m relieved that none of you seem to have passed away or suffered severe wounds, at the very least.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah! That reminds me, I was told companies have different definitions of “death on the job” and the processes of dealing with them. I’m sure Mr. Samjo gave me an explanation on it…
So, Dongrang, are you… continuing your research on improving those cure-all nanobots?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Haha, of course not. HP bullets have long been commercialized. My project right now is the improvement of livestock using them.
Improving… livestock?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: If “cutting” as a concept is reduced to irrelevance… if it becomes limited to a fleeting moment…

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Think about it. We can get an endless supply of high-quality meat.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: And it’s not just any meat; the flesh will come from livestock researched and improved with the combined efforts of countless minds… That’s the quality and rarity we’re talking about.
It seems…
Dongrang has a love for meat as deep as Rodya’s!

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Hmm… Love, you say? You might be right, if endlessly devoting time and care could be called love.
Hah. I guess snobby bunches get along well, eh?
<Don’t beat up our client, okay, Heathcliff?>
Depends on how they behave.
We see live chickens whose wings and legs are being sliced endlessly. They don’t even struggle, as if they feel no pain.
Hmmm… Is this how nanobots look? All I see is liquid…

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: When infinitesimal particles have fluidity, they will look pretty much the same as fluid.
Ugh… Is it really necessary to go this far for food?
This sight is too disgusting to handle for a rich boy who grew up on juicy meat, eh?
…Kiddo, there are lots of people in the world who’d go any length for a meal.
No, I mean… This isn’t the same. And my family wouldn’t eat any meat… I, I was an exception, though…
Why does it have to be like this? What I’m trying to say is…
Ah, I think I know what you’re getting at.
It does feel rather unnatural, doesn't it? If it was simply for the sake of improving food... there could've been more efficient ways to do it.
Ahh~ There's one thing I can say for sure. If this technology had been made available in the Backstreets...
My friends and I wouldn't have had to rummage through trash cans.
...Technology.
No, this is no more than breeding.
They will never realize they have the ability to fly for their entire lives.
Yi Sang spoke, staring directly into Dongrang. It was unusual of him to take this much interest in matters.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I must object. Chickens cannot fly in the first place, and this technology is providing quality welfare to many...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It's okay, Samjo.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: For someone who usually wouldn't look others in the eye to glare directly at a person...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That's a sign of desperation, isn't it?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: The husbandry...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...Something seems to have happened to the lab.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Will it be a good choice to head there now?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It'll be fine, Samjo. They're skilled enough that they got out of a scuffle with K Corp. security staff armed with our regenerative ampules without a scratch.
